metadata.title: CVE-2015-5191 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: VMware Tools prior to 10.0.9 contains multiple file system races in libDeployPkg, related to the use of hard-coded paths under /tmp. Successful exploitation of this issue may result in a local privilege escalation. CVSS:3.0/AV:L/AC:H/PR:L/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H

notes.note: mdeslaur> probably DoS only with symlink restrictions

criterions.comment: open-vm-tools package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:10.1.5-5055683-5ubuntu1').
